title: Princess Leia and Han Solo
author: Tom W. Hartung
card_content_html:
The colorful image of Princess Leia's personality shows her preferences are very slight, making it easy for people to identify with her.

The portrait of Han Solo's personality is not quite as colorful as Leia's, showing his preferences are a bit more well-defined than hers, and that he craves new experiences.
card_first_person_html:
These spiritual portraits show Leia and Han are, in many ways, opposites. Although they are both outgoing, Leia is more decisive — and certainly more logical — than Han.

Being able to visualize these differences helps us see how their differences could be the source of both the attraction and the bickering we see early on in their relationship.
